sources.title: The Land of Missing Men
sources.description: Title: The Land of Missing Men Summary: Steve O'Neil robs the stage and kidnaps Nita to keep Lopez from doing the same. Then he and Buckshot head for Lopez's hideout for a showdown. The townspeople head after them not knowing ... Directed by: John P. McCarthy Actors: Production Company: Trem Carr Pictures Release Date: 15 October 1930 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.20 : 1 Steve O'Neil robs the stage and kidnaps Nita to keep Lopez from doing the same. Then he and Buckshot head for Lopez's hideout for a showdown. The townspeople head after them not knowing what they will find.

sources.title: The Land of Missing Men (1930) BOB STEELE
sources.description:
Stars: Bob Steele, Al St. John, Eddie Dunn
Director: J.P. McGowan

When two cowboys drift into a lonely tavern, they find everyone dead or dying from an attack by bandits. After one of the dying men tells of a plot against his daughter, they head for the high desert badlands on the killers' trail!

metadata.Plot: Steve O'Neil robs the stage and kidnaps Nita to keep Lopez from doing the same. Then he and Buckshot head for Lopez's hideout for a showdown. The townspeople head after them not knowing what they will find.
metadata.Actors: Bob Steele, Al St. John, Eddie Dunn
